Class database.DatabaseTransactions

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.DatabaseTransactions

  • public class database.DatabaseTransactions
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for storing all database transactions that can be triggered throughout the app
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jacob Kristof

      • editTestWrapper

        public void editTestWrapper(dvp.TestWrapper editedTestWrapper,
                            dvp.Test parentTest,
                            dvp.TestResult testResult)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Edits a test in the databse, called when editing the tables in front end. Due to them having TestWrappers, we need additional info
        Parameters:
        editedTestWrapper - the dvp.TestWrapper instance that has updated information
        parentTest - the dvp.Test the dvp.TestWrapper belongs to
        testResult - the dvp.TestResult that was updated in the dvp.TestWrapper
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
